Email_1.Body:
Huh, I cannot believe his mother actually did
    it. Well I guess this is another glitch in the
    flagging algorithm. For every bad accusation,
    our system gets little bit smarter.
            
    Your next assignment is ready. Apparently
    there has been a “hacker” that broke into our
    security and has been manipulating with the
    databases. We suspect that he was a previous
    worker of ours. Find him and bust him.

Email_2.Body:
Great job on the investigation! It is great
    that we get to go into their personal files so
    we can know for sure who started the scandal
    rumor.
